summary: An adventurous couple of hitchhikers decides to accept every ride that is offered to them. no matter how odd the driver might be. They'll get more than they bargained for.
cast: Michael Burns|Meg Foster|Bruce Dern|Michael Conrad|Burke Byrnes|Larry Hankin|Eric Butler|Ed Greenburg|William Murphy|Joyce Van Patten|Marianna Hill|Anna Aries|Donald Elson|Jason Goodrow|Nevada Spencer|Sundown Spencer
title: Carretera violenta
